Reviews.Title: “Favorite motel!”
Reviews.Author: heartsocks
Reviews.Content: family loves motel yearly owners nice clean nice love arent constantly waiting elevator drag stuff lobby kitchenette lunch breakfast fun walk pier food beach isnt crowded daytona nice recommend friends little dated cant beat value time

Reviews.Title: “Just Perfect!”
Reviews.Author: JNJOntario
Reviews.Content: spent week minute arrived gracious host hostess feel welcome family time chat help spacious clean wifi microwave purchase internet card purchase microwave owners told ahead store return motel disappointed hotel personally checked booked advise else motel superb value oceanfront efficiency 5 corner units floor ceiling bay window provide excellent view lots light thank ellen hans wonderful stay

HotelInfo.Name: South Shore Motel
HotelInfo.Address: 3225 South Atlantic Avenue, Daytona Beach, FL 32118
